What was the structure of your jarredSimplePluginXML.jar?
Was it containing other jars?

It had nothing, but plugin.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?eclipse version="3.0"?>
<plugin
   id="com.example.jarredSimplePluginXML"
   name="Jarred Simple PluginXML Plug-in"
   version="1.0.0"
   provider-name="EXAMPLE">
</plugin>

I created the attached jar and I was able to run.
What else is different?

I can no longer reproduce this problem.  I guess it has already been fixed.
Thanks.
